flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=370>>370 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 370*0.1=$<<370*0.1=37>>37
So his purchase came out to 1400-37=$<<1400-37=1363>>1363
#### 1363

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 370. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
